problem.markdown:
For a given thermodynamic state of water at pressure P, it is found that T (P) > T[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline] (P). The state lies in __________ zone
( ) Subcooled Liquid Zone ( ) Supercritical Zone (x) Superheated Fluid Zone ( ) Compressed Liquid Zone
problem.p: For a given thermodynamic state of water at pressure P, it is found that T (P) > T[mathjaxinline]_{sat}[/mathjaxinline] (P). The state lies in __________ zone
